verses.verse: Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall raise up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
You shall put <S%H7760><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%> in it, <S%H8033><s%> and you shall screen <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with the veil. <S%H6532><s%>

You shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the table, <S%H7979><s%> and set in order <S%H6186><s%> the things that are on it. <S%H6187><s%> You shall bring <S%H935><s%> in the lampstand, <S%H4501><s%> and light <S%H5927><s%> its lamps. <S%H5216><s%>

You shall set <S%H5414><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> for incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

"You shall set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of Meeting. <S%H4150><s%>
You shall set <S%H5414><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> between the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and shall put <S%H5414><s%> water therein. <S%H4325><s%>
You shall set up <S%H7760><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, <S%H7760><s%> and hang up the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court. <S%H2691><s%>

"You shall take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil, <S%H8081><s%> and anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and all that is in it, <S%H6942><s%> and shall make it holy, and all its furniture: <S%H3627><s%> and it will be holy. <S%H6944><s%>

You shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> with all its vessels, <S%H3627><s%> and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%> will be most <S%H6944><s%> holy. <S%H6944><s%>
You shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> and its base, <S%H3653><s%> and sanctify it. <S%H6942><s%>

"You shall bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> to the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and shall wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water. <S%H4325><s%>

You shall put <S%H3847><s%> on Aaron <S%H175><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments; <S%H899><s%> and you shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> him, <S%H6942><s%> and sanctify him, <S%H3547><s%> that he may minister to me in the priest's office.
You shall bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and put <S%H3847><s%> coats on them. <S%H3801><s%>

You shall anoint <S%H4886><s%> them, <S%H4886><s%> as you anointed their father, <S%H1><s%> that they may minister to me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office. Their anointing <S%H4888><s%> shall be to them for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> priesthood <S%H3550><s%> throughout their generations. <S%H1755><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H3068><s%> According to all that Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, <S%H6213><s%> so he did.

It happened in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> on the first <S%H7223><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was raised up. <S%H6965><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> raised up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and laid <S%H5414><s%> its sockets, <S%H134><s%> and set up <S%H7760><s%> its boards, <S%H7175><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> in its bars, <S%H1280><s%> and raised up <S%H6965><s%> its pillars. <S%H5982><s%>

He spread the covering <S%H168><s%> over <S%H6566><s%> the tent, <S%H168><s%> and put <S%H7760><s%> the roof <S%H4372><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> on it, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He took <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> into the ark, <S%H727><s%> and set <S%H7760><s%> the poles <S%H905><s%> on the ark, <S%H727><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy seat <S%H3727><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> on the ark. <S%H727><s%>

He brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> into the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and set up <S%H7760><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen, <S%H4539><s%> and screened <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony, <S%H5715><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> northward, <S%H6828><s%> outside <S%H2351><s%> of the veil. <S%H6532><s%>
He set <S%H6187><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> on it before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He put <S%H7760><s%> the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> opposite <S%H5227><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> southward. <S%H5045><s%>
He lit <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
He put <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil; <S%H6532><s%>
and he burnt <S%H6999><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices on it, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
He put up <S%H7760><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

He set <S%H7760><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> on it the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He set <S%H7760><s%> the basin <S%H3595><s%> between the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therein, <S%H7364><s%> with which to wash.
Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet there. <S%H7272><s%>

When they went <S%H935><s%> into the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and when they came near <S%H7126><s%> to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> they washed, <S%H7364><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

He raised up <S%H6965><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and set up <S%H5414><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court. <S%H2691><s%> So Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> the work. <S%H4399><s%>

Then the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

Moses <S%H4872><s%> wasn't <S%H3201><s%> able to enter <S%H935><s%> into the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> because the cloud <S%H6051><s%> stayed <S%H7931><s%> on it, <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh's glory <S%H3519><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

When the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H5921><s%> over the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went onward, <S%H5265><s%> throughout all their journeys; <S%H4550><s%>
but if the cloud <S%H6051><s%> wasn't <S%H5927><s%> taken up, then they didn't <S%H5265><s%> travel until the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was taken up. <S%H5927><s%>

For the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> was on the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> and there was fire <S%H784><s%> in the cloud by night, <S%H3915><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> throughout all their journeys. <S%H4550><s%>
